Package de.uni_passau.fim.infosun.se.chatbot.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    This interface specifies an Action that may be run by the bot.

    Each Action implements an accept() and a run() method.

    accept() determines whether the Action can be applied on the specified input request, run executes the Action and specifies via its return value whether the conversation is to be continued afterwards.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateTimeAction
    This Action reacts to requests that include time or date relevant keywords.
    If run, it simply responds with the current date and time.
    DefaultAction
    This Action can be used as a fallback: It accepts any request and responds with a default answer.
    ExitAction
    This Action accepts keywords that indicate a wish to terminate the conversation.
    HelloAction
    This Action tries to recognize attempts to greet the bot, and responds with a greeting itself and offers its services by chaining the HelpAction.
    HelpAction
    This Action accepts keywords that request assistance, and responds with a respective message.

    TODO: Offer some kind of hints w.r.t.
    MensaAction
    This Action responds to keywords related to food.
    It determines whether the canteen is within its opening hours and provides a link to the menu.
    WeatherAction
    This Action accepts keywords that indicate inquiries about the weather forecast.

    TODO: Respond with current information retrieved from a suitable online service.
